## ImageCache.clear() method

Clear all \[\[ImageItem\]\]s belonging to a \[\[MapView\]\]. May remove cached items if no \[\[MapView\]\] are registered anymore.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
clear(mapView: MapView): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  mapView | [MapView](./harp-mapview.mapview.md) | MapView to remove all \[\[ImageItem\]\]s from. |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
